MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL22 and LL18 postcode areas of Rhyl and Abergele, affecting properties in Abergele Road, Borth Crossroads and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.53PM on 31st October 2020
